name: The Glass Shapeshifter
description:
Play as a shapeshifter that morphs into other creatures.

Controls:
Z / LMB = Confirm / Select
X / RMB = Cancel / Menu
Arrow Keys / LMB = Move

Made in RPG Maker over the course of a week. Unfinished. No download will be available.

Date: [2020-09-26]
Made for the SDC "Voyager Jam"
Theme = "Lifeform"
